riskLevels.medium: Consider removing, may have privacy implications

parasites.name: Google Keystone
parasites.description: Google's update mechanism for all Google products. Runs hourly even after all Google apps removed.

parasites.name: Adobe Genuine Software
parasites.description: License validation service that phones home frequently to verify Adobe software legitimacy.

parasites.name: Adobe GC Invoker
parasites.description: Analytics collection service that sends usage data to Adobe servers.

parasites.name: Adobe ARMDC
parasites.description: Adobe Remote Management and Diagnostics Client. Handles updates and telemetry relay.

parasites.name: CCleaner Services
parasites.description: Ironic - a 'cleaner' app with 6+ persistent background processes for scanning, updates, and telemetry.

parasites.name: Zoom Daemon
parasites.description: Video conferencing daemon that runs even when Zoom is not in use. Monitors audio devices.

parasites.name: Microsoft AutoUpdate
parasites.description: Microsoft's update service for Office, Edge, and other Microsoft products.

parasites.name: Spotify Web Helper
parasites.description: Background helper for Spotify web player integration and media key handling.

parasites.name: JetBrains Toolbox
parasites.description: IDE manager that runs continuously to manage and update JetBrains products. Includes telemetry.

parasites.name: Docker Desktop
parasites.description: Container platform with network daemon and helper services. Can use significant resources.

parasites.name: Dropbox
parasites.description: Cloud storage with aggressive sync daemon and Finder integration. Continuous file monitoring.

parasites.name: Microsoft OneDrive
parasites.description: Cloud storage sync service with Finder integration and background update daemon.

parasites.name: Google Drive
parasites.description: Google Drive File Stream with background sync and Finder integration.

parasites.name: Box Drive
parasites.description: Enterprise cloud storage with background sync daemon.

parasites.name: Slack
parasites.description: Team communication with background notification helper and presence detection.

parasites.name: Discord
parasites.description: Gaming communication with auto-update service and rich presence integration.

parasites.name: Microsoft Teams
parasites.description: Enterprise communication with extensive background services and persistent WebRTC connections.

parasites.name: Telegram
parasites.description: Messaging app with background notification helper.

parasites.name: WhatsApp Desktop
parasites.description: WhatsApp desktop with background notification helper.

parasites.name: Signal Desktop
parasites.description: Secure messaging with background notification helper.

parasites.name: Cisco Webex
parasites.description: Enterprise video conferencing with background daemon and audio monitoring.

parasites.name: Skype
parasites.description: Video calling with background notification helper.

parasites.name: Brave Browser Update
parasites.description: Auto-update service for Brave browser.

parasites.name: Firefox Update
parasites.description: Firefox background update service.

parasites.name: 1Password
parasites.description: Password manager with keychain integration and browser helper.

removal.warning: Ensure passwords are exported before removal!

parasites.name: Bitwarden
parasites.description: Open source password manager with background helper.

removal.warning: Ensure passwords are exported before removal!

parasites.name: LastPass
parasites.description: Password manager with background sync and browser helper.

removal.warning: Ensure passwords are exported before removal!

parasites.name: NordVPN
parasites.description: VPN with privileged helper daemon for network configuration.

parasites.name: ExpressVPN
parasites.description: VPN with privileged helper daemon and agent.

parasites.name: Surfshark VPN
parasites.description: VPN with privileged helper daemon.

parasites.name: Tunnelblick
parasites.description: OpenVPN client with background tunnel daemon.

parasites.name: Tailscale
parasites.description: Zero-config VPN with system extension.

removal.note: System extension may need manual removal

parasites.name: Little Snitch
parasites.description: Network monitor with kernel extension and helper.

removal.note: Use built-in uninstaller for complete removal

parasites.name: Malwarebytes
parasites.description: Anti-malware with background scan daemon.

removal.note: Use built-in uninstaller for complete removal

parasites.name: Avast Security
parasites.description: Antivirus with multiple background daemons.

removal.note: Use built-in uninstaller for complete removal

parasites.name: VLC Media Player
parasites.description: Media player with optional update checker.

parasites.name: Plex Media Server
parasites.description: Media server with background streaming daemon.

parasites.name: OBS Studio
parasites.description: Streaming software with virtual camera helper.

parasites.name: HandBrake
parasites.description: Video transcoder with optional background helper.

parasites.name: IINA
parasites.description: Modern media player with optional helper.

parasites.name: Xcode Simulators
parasites.description: iOS/watchOS simulators that can consume 50+ GB of disk space.

removal.note: Use 'xcrun simctl list' to see installed simulators

parasites.name: Homebrew Services
parasites.description: Background services installed via Homebrew (databases, servers).

removal.note: List services with 'brew services list' first

parasites.name: PostgreSQL
parasites.description: Database server with background daemon.

parasites.name: MongoDB
parasites.description: Document database with background daemon.

parasites.name: Redis
parasites.description: In-memory data store with background daemon.

parasites.name: MySQL
parasites.description: SQL database with background daemon.

parasites.name: macFUSE
parasites.description: Filesystem extension for mounting various filesystems.

removal.note: Use official uninstaller for complete removal

parasites.name: Wireshark BPF
parasites.description: Packet capture helper for network analysis.

parasites.name: MEGA Sync
parasites.description: Cloud storage sync with background updater.

parasites.name: pCloud Drive
parasites.description: Cloud storage with background sync daemon.

parasites.name: Sync.com
parasites.description: Secure cloud storage with background sync.

parasites.name: VMware Fusion
parasites.description: Desktop hypervisor with privileged helpers for disk, VM, and mount operations.

parasites.name: Perplexity AI
parasites.description: AI assistant with XPC helper for browser extension communication.

commands.findOrphans: for plist in ~/Library/LaunchAgents/*.plist; do bundle_id=$(basename "$plist" .plist); mdfind "kMDItemCFBundleIdentifier == '$bundle_id'" 2>/dev/null | grep -q . || echo "Orphan: $plist"; done
